title: EastEnders spoilers: Whitney Dean discovers Callum Highway’s secret
text:
They may no longer be an item, but Whitney Dean (Shona McGarty) makes yet another shocking discovery about Callum ‘Halfway’ Highway (Tony Clay) in EastEnders during the coming episodes, and she’s left reeling as a result.

Whitney was heartbroken when her relationship with Callum fell part after she’d discovered that he’d cheated on her with Ben (Max Bowden). Following her wedding-that-never-was, she jetted off on her honeymoon to gather her thoughts, and — upon doing so — she returned home with a more positive attitude about everything that transpired between her and Callum.

Yes, both she and Callum have got along rather nicely since her return, and it became clear that there was no animosity between them.

In fact, it’s rather the opposite, as Whitney commented how happy she was that Callum was now free to be himself, while Callum has made it clear that he still very much cares about her.

Advertisement

Advertisement

However, with Leo (Tom Wells) trying to get his claws into Whitney, it’s safe to say her alliance with her ex-fiancé proves to be a problem for him. In fact, he believes that Callum could spoil his plan to get close to the young woman if he’s not careful.

As a result, Leo sets about getting some dirt on the loveable undertaker, and it doesn’t take him too long to do so, as he makes a surprising discovery. Later, he questions Callum about his time in the army.

Whitney spots a file on Leo’s laptop with Callum’s name on it, and — upon accessing said file — she’s later left devastated by what she finds.

Leo has clearly set a trap — one that Whitney’s walked right into.

Will Whitney see through Leo’s games? Or will she turn against Callum once and for all?

One to watch: Thursday 24th October at 7:30pm on BBC One.

Advertisement Advertisement
description: Whitney gets more than she bargained for — but is this the end of her newfound friendship with Callum?
